resources.string: This screen will show the transport controls, and will use the Spotify Android SDK for functionality as shown at https://developer.spotify.com/technologies/spotify-android-sdk/.
This screen will show the top charts, and will use the Spotify Android SDK for functionality as shown at https://developer.spotify.com/technologies/spotify-android-sdk/
This screen will show the new releases, and will use the Spotify Android SDK for functionality as shown at https://developer.spotify.com/technologies/spotify-android-sdk/
